sources.title: The Painted Hills 1951 [ Colorized, 4k, 60 fps]
sources.description: The painted hills is a 1951 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab
